name: Excelsior Works!
description: Excelsior Works! is a multicultural and multilingual workforce development center that provides low-income youth, adults, seniors, and immigrants with economic independence through various programs. The mission of the Excelsior Works! is to create a viable link to workforce development that leads to financial sustainability of individuals and families, strengthened community and Excelsior identity. Excelsior Works! is a new center where residents of every age and culture can find workforce progr
